title: CTAB mix
original description: This solution is used in the coral genomic DNA extraction protocol.  The following recipe is for 50 mL of CTAB mix. Store at -20°C.
steps:
None
1. Dissolve 0.75 g CTAB in ~ 20 mL MilliQ water 
1amount 
reagents
2. Add 12.5 mL of 4 M NaCl  
reagents
3. Add 75 µL of E. coli tRNA at 20 mg/mL  
NOTES E. coli tRNA is used as a carrier nucleic acid to boost total nucleic acid concentrations and increase the extraction yield
4. Make up to a final volume of 50 mL with MilliQ water  
reagents
